Events that occurred on 9 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1921 - Author Gisbert Kranz is born.
1928 - Artist Frank Frazetta is born.
1953 - Actor Ciarán Hinds is born.
1960 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222a.
1968 - The last day of filming J.R.R. Tolkien for the documentary Tolkien in Oxford.
1972 - Voice actor Crispin Freeman is born.
1980 - Voice actor Heron Carvic dies.
1991 - First official meeting of the Sociedad Tolkien Española.
2007 - Lars Gustafsson writes "Professorn fick en idé".
2008 - "C.S. Lewis, the Inklings, and the Call to Christian Community" conference, featuring Tom Shippey.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Lothlórien.
